## Description {#details}

Remove an instruction from the IR.

### InstructionRemover() {#a36c850534aa0f8a8b6eb076edbd22b71}

  labels = {["inline"]}>
Remove all reference of <code>Inst</code> and optionally replace all its uses with New.

<code>RemovedInsts</code> Keep track of the instructions removed by this Action. 
<SectionUser title="Precondition">
If !Inst-&gt;use&#95;empty(), then New != nullptr
</SectionUser>
